steps.name: User is on Login page
User enters "erp.maxgroup@gmail.com" into Username field
User enters "123" into Password field
User Click LogIn button
User Login Successfully
User select Creator at CDA
click Confirm button
User Click Cheque button
User Click Create Cheque button
User Click Regular BO button

elements.name: User Fillup Vendor & Amount Selection section

steps.name: User Click Vendor & Amount Selection button
User Click Requisition type field and select "Material Requisition Payments"
User Click Vendor List field and select "Gazipur Polish Store"
User Click ID Requisition button
User enters "1" in first row TDS field
User enters "2" in first row VDS field
User enters "5" in first row Amount field
User Click Bank Select and select "Trust Bank"
User Click Account No field and select "0210589481"
User Click select Chequebook and select "1122"
User Click Beneficiary Name and select "Asad & Co"
User Click Cheque Category field and select Bearer Cheque
User Click Cheque Auditor field and select "ERP Admin"
User Click Signatory Authority field and select "ERP Admin"
User Click Material Requisition Payments Submit button

elements.name: Verify Data of Material Requisition Payments Cheque

steps.name: User Collect Total Amount Data and Verify
User Collect Beneficiary Name and Verify
User Collect Bank name and Verify
User Collect Account Data and Verify
User Collect "Check Request Created" Status and Verify
User Collect TDS Data and Verify
User Collect VDS Data and Verify
User Collect Total Amount and Verify
User Click Select User button for Auditor
User Click Review button
User Collect "Cheque Request Reviewed" Status and Verify
User Click Select User button for Creator
User Click Print button
User Close New Tab
User Click Confirm button
User Collect "Cheque Printed" Status and Verify
User Click Select User button for Cheque Approver
User Click Approve button
User Collect "Cheque Request Approved" Status and Verify
User Click Select User button for Creator
User Click Deliver button
User enters "Asif" into Cheque Recever name field
User enters "01899999999" into Recever phone Number field
User Click Confirm Delevery button
User Collect "Check Delivered" Status and Verify
User Click Complete button
